trans-unit.source: Creates a transformation that selects the same subset of columns as in the given dataset
trans-unit.target: Creates a transformation that selects the same subset of columns as in the given dataset

trans-unit.source: You can use the <ui>Select Columns Transform</ui> module to create a transformation that will ensure that the same set of columns is always used in downstream operations.
trans-unit.target: You can use the <ui>Select Columns Transform</ui> module to create a transformation that will ensure that the same set of columns is always used in downstream operations.

trans-unit.source: This can be useful if you want to apply an operation that always requires specific columns and you make sure that column selections do not change, as this might break the experiment or change the results.
trans-unit.target: This can be useful if you want to apply an operation that always requires specific columns and you make sure that column selections do not change, as this might break the experiment or change the results.

trans-unit.source: Note that you can also use <link xlink:href="1ec722fa-b623-4e26-a44e-a50c6d726223" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Project columns</link> to choose a subset of columns to use in a downstream module.
trans-unit.target: Note that you can also use <link xlink:href="1ec722fa-b623-4e26-a44e-a50c6d726223" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Project columns</link> to choose a subset of columns to use in a downstream module.

trans-unit.source: However, <link xlink:href="1ec722fa-b623-4e26-a44e-a50c6d726223" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Project columns</link> is not always the easiest to configure if there are many columns.
trans-unit.target: However, <link xlink:href="1ec722fa-b623-4e26-a44e-a50c6d726223" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Project columns</link> is not always the easiest to configure if there are many columns.

trans-unit.source: Moreover, there are times when the selection of columns in an input dataset might change depending on feature selection or other operations.
trans-unit.target: Moreover, there are times when the selection of columns in an input dataset might change depending on feature selection or other operations.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you use <link xlink:href="818b356b-045c-412b-aa12-94a1d2dad90f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Filter Based Feature Selection</link> with a dataset to automatically find the best features in a dataset, and then use the dataset created by <link xlink:href="818b356b-045c-412b-aa12-94a1d2dad90f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Filter Based Feature Selection</link> as an input to <link xlink:href="5cc7053e-aa30-450d-96c0-dae4be720977" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Train Model</link>.
trans-unit.target: For example, suppose you use <link xlink:href="818b356b-045c-412b-aa12-94a1d2dad90f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Filter Based Feature Selection</link> with a dataset to automatically find the best features in a dataset, and then use the dataset created by <link xlink:href="818b356b-045c-412b-aa12-94a1d2dad90f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Filter Based Feature Selection</link> as an input to <link xlink:href="5cc7053e-aa30-450d-96c0-dae4be720977" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Train Model</link>.

trans-unit.source: Because <link xlink:href="818b356b-045c-412b-aa12-94a1d2dad90f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Filter Based Feature Selection</link> evaluates the feature importance based on the values in the column, it is impossible to know beforehand which columns to use when scoring.
trans-unit.target: Because <link xlink:href="818b356b-045c-412b-aa12-94a1d2dad90f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Filter Based Feature Selection</link> evaluates the feature importance based on the values in the column, it is impossible to know beforehand which columns to use when scoring.

trans-unit.source: Moreover, if you apply <link xlink:href="818b356b-045c-412b-aa12-94a1d2dad90f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Filter Based Feature Selection</link> to the scoring dataset, it might choose a different set of columns, which would cause the scoring operation to fail.
trans-unit.target: Moreover, if you apply <link xlink:href="818b356b-045c-412b-aa12-94a1d2dad90f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Filter Based Feature Selection</link> to the scoring dataset, it might choose a different set of columns, which would cause the scoring operation to fail.

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, you can use the <ui>Select Columns Transform</ui> module to generate a transformation (which you can save as an <link xlink:href="444302ce-a1b6-4003-9a64-8a56120be6ce" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Itransform</link>) to ensure that the same set of columns is used for scoring that is used for training.
trans-unit.target: In this scenario, you can use the <ui>Select Columns Transform</ui> module to generate a transformation (which you can save as an <link xlink:href="444302ce-a1b6-4003-9a64-8a56120be6ce" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Itransform</link>) to ensure that the same set of columns is used for scoring that is used for training.

trans-unit.source: Dataset containing desired set of columns
trans-unit.target: Dataset containing desired set of columns

trans-unit.source: Transformation that selects the same subset of columns as in the given dataset.
trans-unit.target: Transformation that selects the same subset of columns as in the given dataset.

trans-unit.source: Exception occurs if one or more of inputs are null or empty.
trans-unit.target: Exception occurs if one or more of inputs are null or empty.
